verses.verse: A Psalm of David. I will give thee thanks<WH2167> with my whole heart<WH3820>: Before the gods<WH430> will I sing praises unto thee<WH2167>.

I will worship<WH7812> toward thy holy<WH6944> temple<WH1964>, And give thanks<WH3034> unto thy name<WH8034> for thy lovingkindness<WH2617> and for thy truth<WH571>: For thou hast magnified<WH1431> thy word<WH565> above all thy name<WH8034>.
In the day<WH3117> that I called<WH7121> thou answeredst<WH6030> me<WH7292>, Thou didst encourage me with strength<WH5797> in my soul<WH5315>.
All the kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776> shall give thee thanks<WH3034>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, For they have heard<WH8085> the words<WH561> of thy mouth<WH6310>.
Yea <WH7891>, they shall sing of the ways<WH1870> of Jehovah<WH3068>; For great<WH1419> is the glory<WH3519> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
For though Jehovah<WH3068> is high<WH7311>, yet hath he respect<WH7200> unto the lowly<WH8217>; But the haughty<WH1364> he knoweth<WH3045> from afar<WH4801>.

Though I walk<WH3212> in the midst<WH7130> of trouble<WH6869>, thou wilt revive<WH2421> me<WH7971>; Thou wilt stretch forth thy hand<WH3027> against the wrath<WH639> of mine enemies<WH341>, And thy right hand<WH3225> will save me<WH3467>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will perfect<WH1584> that which concerneth me<WH2617>: Thy lovingkindness, O Jehovah<WH3068>, endureth for ever<WH5769>; Forsake<WH7503> not the works<WH4639> of thine own hands<WH3027>.
